backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with types and state for files, notes, folders, missions, uploads, and authorization, with initial variables and maps for core storage logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON list providing concise summaries of major frontend components and utilities, describing behavior, structure, and interactions.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation outlining creation of a new draft synced exactly to Live v114, including verification steps and baseline integrity rules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice stating no code modifications are allowed post‑restoration until explicit user approval, with guidelines and exceptions.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app metadata, theme colors, icons, and behavior for MYL.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, runtime caching, cache cleanup, and navigation fallback for the PWA.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Checklist and instructions for verifying PWA installability on Chrome for Android, covering manifest, service worker, icons, and troubleshooting.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist documenting verification of all frontend files and behaviors to ensure full alignment with Live version 114.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component wiring providers, intro screen logic, and the home page with query and actor contexts.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing detailed actor initialization errors with retry, logout, and technical details expansion.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an interactive SVG target-style icon with hover animations and a glow effect.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Displays a fixed decorative horizontal line near the bottom of the screen.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot be opened in a new tab, offering retry and download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Provides a dialog for previewing files of various types and includes actions like open, download, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles uploading files, creating links and notes, with concurrency control, speech‑to‑text, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders interface, with optional pulse and overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folder management view supporting create, rename, delete, and selection actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Provides a full-screen file viewer with navigation, touch gestures, file actions, and sharing support.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a gallery with selection, previews, bulk actions, and viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the top navigation bar with theme toggle, auth menu, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/HomeSharedElemen: Implements shared-element animations between home screen sections using DOMRect transitions.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a brief intro splash screen with a fading animation before loading the app.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog that appears when a link fails to open, offering retry and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A login button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission detail view handling tasks, autosave, attached files/notes, and viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title and task management, using mutations to save new missions.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating missions button with icon, hover effects, and optional pulse animation.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list with tabs, mission selection, deletion, and mission creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper component that constrains children to a mobile-only layout container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog to move selected files or notes to a mission, showing mission list and handling move operations.
frontend/src/components/NotesButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NotesDialog.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NotesFullScreenV: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a single note with options to download, share, move, or delete it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes into folders or back to main collection, using folder-related mutations.
A swipeable row component that reveals edit and delete actions, handling drag gestures and state transitions.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a unified progress bar summarizing active file, link, and note uploads with aggregate progress.
frontend/src/components/UploadQueueRunne: Restores and resumes persisted uploads with concurrency control, tracks progress, and cleans up on unmount.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Renders the introductory welcome screen with branding graphics and a login entry point.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization with retries, error handling, and identity-aware lifecycle management.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Tracks upload items, progress, completion, and restoration, providing functions to start and update uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity changes, initializing admin access and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once when the backend actor and identity are ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, status tracking, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Triggers a callback when the app regains focus or visibility, but only after identity initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer like touch input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Autosaves mission title and tasks with debouncing, change detection, and queued updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating missions with backend actor validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and deleting notes across folders and missions with concurrency limiting.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders through the backend actor with caching and concurrency control.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements a speech‑to‑text hook using the browser SpeechRecognition API with transcript streaming and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and layout styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home page component managing UI state, authentication readiness, data fetching, and lazy‑loaded folder/mission views.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Provides utilities and constants for classifying actor initialization errors and generating user‑facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides helpers to open URLs, download files, share files, and detect popup blocking via visibility and focus events.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytesWorkerSingle: Manages a singleton web worker for reading file bytes with limited concurrency and queued requests.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Defines rules for whether files open in-app or download based on MIME category.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies files by MIME type and provides previewability checks and human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Computes mission progress, checks completion status, and separates missions into completed and incomplete lists.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares two task arrays safely with BigInt IDs by checking each field for equality.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements optional performance timing utilities enabled via localStorage or URL parameters.
Stores upload items in IndexedDB, updating their progress, bytes, and completion state with size limits.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation lifecycle events in development mode for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs backend-driven smoke tests for core flows like folder, mission, link, and note creation and formats results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Provides concurrency limiters for async tasks, including a cancellable version with queue stats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/src/workers/fileBytes.worker.ts: Web Worker that reads file bytes off the main thread and returns them with metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining custom colors, radius, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list defining the exact frontend baseline for Live version 114 used for drift detection and draft syncing.
project_state.json: Project state JSON describing inline in‑app document preview requirements and existing features.
